- Fixed agent.name/agent.model propagation (no more 'pending' values)
- Added cost calculation from token counts using model-pricing.json config
- Improved trace propagation for subagents (proper parent-child linking)
- Added subagent type tracking on session spans
- Added session timing, tool sequencing, and cumulative token tracking
- Normalized span naming (session:main, agent:{type})
- Added plugin.version for tracking
